summary: This document is an email chain regarding the preparation and service of a subpoena to American Express for financial records related to the Epstein investigation. It involves coordination between a forensic accountant and an FBI special agent from the New York Field Office.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant
persons.context: The individual is preparing a subpoena for American Express records and is the primary point of contact for questions regarding the subpoena.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The FBI agent is to receive the electronic results from the American Express subpoena at the New York Field Office.

connections.description: The forensic accountant is preparing a subpoena for the FBI special agent, who will serve it and receive the results.

events.title: Subpoena Preparation for American Express
events.description: A forensic accountant is instructed to prepare a subpoena for American Express records, with the FBI special agent to serve it and receive the electronic results.

keyFacts: A subpoena was being prepared for American Express financial records as part of the Epstein investigation in October 2019.
The FBI New York Field Office was directly involved, with a special agent designated to receive the subpoena results.
The correspondence indicates active financial investigation into Epstein's affairs following his arrest.
